post.body: I'm sorry, I just looked at your site (little snow photo on the right); I will not tell you how nuce it is here anymore:)
Make sure you have everything before you leave, you're already late, don't be unprepared as well :)
7:42am, had 3 mugs and walked Hank the Pug twice; life is good:)
Been beautiful weather here lately! Safe trip:)
We seem to have gravitated to "cook for yourself" except for Holiday meals where we cook for a bunch:)
Second tweet I read speaking of "Lost followers" sounds like a conspiracy:)
from what I read, Detroit could use all the help they can get! My vote would be massive "Apprentice Programs" for careers:)
I still think you're "Top Notch!" (but what the heck do I know, I'm a crazy old man:)
Get the check :)
I have been fortunate, been taking days for many years:) Listen to me, "Take the days now... work later if you have to" :)
Enjoy the artistic aspect of it! (why I'm in Tampa Bay); going to take the"Bike" for a ride when it get up to about 75 or so :)
Not nice to laugh at others troubles, but I did. That is a staggering number of phones left behind. A lot of embarassing info.:)
Neuron patterns don't go away:)
Spent an hourl aughed at the descriptions and suggestions; spot on:)
Maybe they didn't originate the line, "Put some lipstick on that pig and get it out the door!", bu that is part of their credo:)
Talk to your Broker, they'll tell you it's a buying opportunity!
Regret is a very powerful emotion. It can be used to stimulate one into making better choices and taking better action:)
I am not Tiger, but I have never seen worse than "Sir Charles"
Disney, BTW does it up right! Volunteers, course, rest stat., atmosphere. A little costly, but a great experience:)
Remember stories of Cabrini Green... Watched "City of God" (sub-titled film re: slums outside of Rio) last night, strong film
Don'y know where this weather came from, but it has just been perfect day after day; ride the Yamaha, hit the golf ball, repeat:)
Their wealth & vast lands could morph the entire region in a year; the Royals like the attention focus the way it is. Greed:(
Saudi Royal Family could stop it in a few weeks; but that would mean using their wealth to help their people. 15,000 Princes!
Radio-Carbon Dating shows Dick Clark's actual age to be 957, really :)
Happy New Year to you Susie! Not a lot of celeb. my wife was sick (cold) bed early, kids come for breakfast soon:)
Disney signup for the 2010 marathon is next week! I'll be there(it will be my 3rd Disney mara.). Took a break, but I am back:)
Ahhh, but Minnesota does primary education well. Pays attention to the arts; understands preserving the environment & more:)
The roads are full of SUV's that stop in the left hand lane and turn without signaling; that must be them:)
Wife looks at me with disdain when I heat up leftover coffee in microwave the next morning; "Depression era parents", I am frugal
Worked in a sausage factory over summer vacation once. A guy I knew's Uncle owned it. Didn't eat any for years after that:)
@cheeky_geeky I understand that, sleep is good:) Read some scary study that to be short changed on sleep is worse than smoking..
I was a NYC cab driver during school years, I am familiar with that sinking feeling:)
Depends on your point of view, "Nice Shoes, Gimme'em!"
I do not like MRI's, I understand...
Amazing how many high dollar big co.'s make it hard to do bus. with them... I may list a few on my blog later:)
Wife made these great chocolate (brownie like) cookies with peanut butter in the middle, 1,000 calories each :)
Hank the Pug, surgery Tues. ("Fixed") not my idea, wife's. Not even 2 days later he's still nuts (even without them), determined to be him:)
Old clip from youtube, but if you like to see "Justice Served" spend 2 min. you'll smile: http://www.stevesimon.us/blog/?p=515
67 degrees and the sun is coming up over the church down the block; going to be another stellar day in West Central FL :)
Wife looked at Twitter last night (over my shoulder) for the 1st time) I don't think she thinks it is interesting. 1st look, things change:)
